text:
**Observation:**

Kiam is playing on the carpet with the castle.  
He tells a friend "I'm going to scare the girls!"  
and takes the dragon over and shouts "Rahhh!"  
A friend says put your soldiers on her (he does).  
His friend says "You are a bad boy! Kiam replies  
"he not the bad boy, this one is." His friend tells him  
to put the bad boy in the dragons mountain he  
does. He plays for 5 mins making battle sounds.  
He turns to a friend "Are you having not school  
dinners?" His friend says "Yes, having not school  
dinners?" His friend says "Yes, having not school  
dinners." His friend says "Yes, having not school  
dinners." His friend says "Yes, I am not having not school  
dinners." His friend says "Yes, I am not having not school  

Then he came up to me and said "We are  
learning X today. I asked "How do you  
know?" He pointed to the wall I can see it  
up there! "Then Kiam asks and I know T  
and S too! He then asked "I have tried  
up, can I get my snack and go to play  
now."
